channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass, 2nd August
item.description:
Large amount of broken glass on the entrance of the path to the playground and Old Pats

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southfield Approach, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Paint spill on pavement, 2nd August
item.description:
Paint spill (white emulsion) on pavement, in front of no. 61. Spilt on 31st July.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Cleeve View Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous hole around drain ., 2nd August
item.description:
The stone blocks surrounding the drain have become dislodged and a dangerous hole has appeared. It is in the highway at the entrance to the garage, the entrance which is nearest the crossroads. (There are 2 entrances). If a vehicle hit this at speed it would be very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Telephone Obstruction for Viewing, 2nd August
item.description:
A couple of weeks ago I was turning right in my car from Lower Winchcombe Street into Albion Street,Cheltenham. I almost hit a fast moving cyclist as I entered Albion Street.. He was in the Bus Lane. There is a telephone kiosk, and a post which I believe obstructed my view of the fast moving cyclist in the Bus Lane. I certainly don`t think the telephone kiosk should be in that location as it partially obscures what is coming along/my view.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Winchcombe Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car no tax or mot, 2nd August
item.description:
Vehicle no tax or mot . Reg SA08HTL silver corsa
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Annatto Close, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Digs barking durng sleeping hours, 2nd August
item.description:
Have spoken to the owner of the dogs on a couple of occasions asking him to please keep his dogs quiet. The dogs bark for several minutes usually at 4.30am to 5.00am. Tonight , they barked at 3.10 am.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Ryeworth Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Long pot hole, 31st July
item.description:
I reported this pot hole on Saturday 29th July. Opposite Orchard Cottage. This is Not Hyde Lane, it's Brockhamton lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obscured sign on Prestbury High street and the bank corner, 31st July
item.description:
This sign should be at right angles to the High street directing people down The Bank to the Church and the much valued Idsall drive Car Park.See 2020 and 2022 photos.Previously reported in summer 2020 when it became 'buried' in the trees.Simple maintenance job needed by landowner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32;34, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous pot holes getting worse Malleson Road, 31st July
item.description:
This long string of pot holes starts at the Malleson Road/A435 junction and runs along, worst on the Southern side, to beyond Lawrenceâ€™s Meadow. The road surface has become very poor over the years but with the two new developments and the replacement gas main work along the length it has now become dangerously and continuously damaged. The whole length needs total resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Malleson Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Swindon, Cheltenham

item.title: Large pothole, 31st July
item.description:
South bound m5 between jct 10 and 11, large pothole in lane 1. Scared the life out of us when we went over this. Had to check no car or tyre damage soon after.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury

item.title: Overgrown public right of way, 30th July
item.description:
Overgrown vegetation is preventing access along the public right of way just off The Wharf lane at Coombe Hill so is not safe for public walkers to use. This needs to be cut back as it is currently inaccessible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Wharf, Leigh, Tewkesbury

item.title: Large deep pothole at the bottom of Kidderminster Road, 29th July
item.description:
There are potholes all the way up Kidderminster Road, the whole road surface is really awful and has been for months. There is a pothole at the bottom of the road which is larger and deeper than the others and catch people out as they come round the corner if they aren't aware it's there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kyderminster Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
